profile.description: Return the profile of the user, without the inventory.

inventory.description: Return the inventory of the user.

equip.description: Equip the item passed as param.
equip.itemNotInInventory: Cannot equip **{{itemName}}** since you don't have it in your inventory.
equip.wantsReplaceItem: You already have **{{itemName}}** equipped for that type of item, do you want to replace it?

args.itemName: Which item do you equip? (Enter the name of the item)
